demo1.aiInsight: You dominate mid-game rotations and objective trades. Close games earlier to capitalize on leads.
recommendedActions: Secure Baron vision two minutes early to convert leads into finishes.
Reset at 22 minutes to buy control wards before contesting elder objectives.
Drill side-lane wave syncs to pressure towers while your team sets mid priority.
demo1.personality: Mid-Game Maestro — you make plays that tilt outcomes.

2024-06.message: Hot streak — wrapped up a 6-game win streak

2024-07.message: Jeevi tried ADC for 4 games — results mixed

2024-10.message: Pulled off a Camille solo carry over a weekend

demo2.aiInsight: Exceptional map control and playmaking — add deeper warding on rotations and time control wards for Baron.
recommendedActions: Replenish control wards after every recall to keep Baron entrances locked down.
Track enemy jungle pathing with early river wards to set up mid roam plays.
Ping objectives 45 seconds early to group and layer crowd control.
demo2.personality: Silent Mapmaker — games are won before fights even begin.

2024-08.message: Experimented with engage supports — took a few losses

2024-11.message: Clutch Baron steals secured Master promos

demo3.aiInsight: You excel at 1v1 pressure and map isolation — work on teamfight adaptation to close games more reliably.
recommendedActions: Shadow your jungler during herald spawns to convert split-push pressure into objectives.
Time teleports with your support engage to impact first major teamfight.
Review mid-game deaths to trim risky side-lane pushes after 25 minutes.
demo3.personality: Split Pusher — when lanes are empty, you're already taking towers.

2024-06.message: Mountains popped off on Camille for 3 games straight

2024-07.message: Tried teamfighting more — didn't go as planned

2024-11.message: Split push perfection — 8-game win streak to Grandmaster
